name: Jukka Purma
body:
I am finalizing my Doctor of Arts in Aalto University school of Arts, Design and Architecture, in [Learning Environments Research Group](http://legroup.uiah.fi). Mail me at firstname-dot-lastname-at-aalto-dot-fi.

## [Kataja - visualizing biolinguistics](http://www.kataja.purma.fi) 

@jpurma -- see what I've been doing lately in GitHub 

### You may be looking for my brother Lasse and [Purmaconsulting OY](http://purmaconsulting.com).
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
